Title: Instant Messaging
Description:
Welcome, wikket! Me Kah Kah - chief of Grookin Hill hozen.

Dook Ookem wanted to be chief, but good wikket grook him good - big gift to Kah Kah.

Hozen has gift for good wikket too. Gift come from great crash. Hozen keep it safe for wikket.
ObjectivesText: Use the Hellscream's Fist Signal Flare near Chief Kah Kah at Grookin Hill.
